doc.title: Neil Diamond: The Making of 'The Movie Album'
doc.plot: This special features Diamond singing songs from movie music, interspersed with film clips and footage of Diamond in and out of the recording studio. Among the songs featured in the special are "As Time Goes By'' from "Casablanca'' (1942); "The Look of Love'' from "Casino Royale'' (1954); "Can't Help Falling in Love'' from "Blue Hawaii'' (1962) and the Oscar-winning "Secret Love" from "Calamity Jane'' (1953). Also included is ''Love With The Proper Stranger,'' the title track of the 1963 romance starring Natalie Wood and Steve McQueen.
